mapper.select: SELECT prod_code , c.category_code , category_name , prod_name , prod_price , soldout_yn , prod_desc FROM tbl_product p JOIN tbl_category c ON c.category_code = p.category_code WHERE soldout_yn = 'N' ORDER BY prod_code ASC

SELECT prod_code , c.category_code , category_name , prod_name , prod_price , soldout_yn , prod_desc FROM tbl_product p JOIN tbl_category c ON c.category_code = p.category_code WHERE soldout_yn = 'N' AND c.category_code = #{code}

SELECT prod_code , c.category_code , category_name , prod_name , prod_price , soldout_yn , prod_desc FROM tbl_product p JOIN tbl_category c ON c.category_code = p.category_code WHERE soldout_yn = 'N' AND prod_name LIKE CONCAT ('%' , #{key}, '%')

SELECT prod_option_code , prod_name , prod_price , category_name , prod_color , prod_size FROM tbl_product p JOIN tbl_category c ON c.category_code = p.category_code JOIN tbl_prod_option po ON po.prod_code = p.prod_code WHERE soldout_yn = 'N' AND p.prod_code = #{code}

SELECT po.prod_option_code , p.prod_code , s.stock_quantity , p.prod_name , po.prod_size , po.prod_color , p.prod_price * s.stock_quantity AS prod_price FROM tbl_prod_option po JOIN tbl_stock s ON s.stock_option_code = po.prod_option_code JOIN tbl_product p ON p.prod_code = po.prod_code ORDER BY p.prod_code

SELECT po.prod_option_code , p.prod_code , p.prod_name , po.prod_color , po.prod_size , s.stock_quantity , p.prod_price FROM tbl_product p JOIN tbl_prod_option po ON po.prod_code = p.prod_code JOIN tbl_stock s ON s.stock_option_code = po.prod_option_code WHERE p.prod_code = #{code}
